caller_intent: The caller wanted to make a down payment on their Progressive auto insurance policy and confirm the payment details.
resolution_steps: Agent verified the caller's identity and confirmed the policy is with Progressive.
Agent located the payment amount ($220.11) and asked for payment method.
Caller corrected the amount to $220.11 and provided credit card details (ending in 48).
Agent processed the payment and confirmed it was successful.
Agent provided confirmation details and offered further assistance.
summary: Customer called to make a down payment on their Progressive auto insurance. The agent verified the policy, processed the $220.11 payment via credit card, and confirmed the transaction. The customer indicated no further assistance was needed.
